txt.en: 'Look at those poor beggars down there. Those Orcs employ the lash without mercy.\n\n'I cannot stand the sight of it! If you wish to be of help, you bring me those whips, and I'll see to some compensation for your efforts.'
'Ah, I see you brought me those whips. It is good to know that these will not be seeing any more use.'
Vicious Orc-slavers torment the Dunlending and Rohirrim captives in their mines.
Orc Slavers can be found throughout the Orc-mines.\n\nOndor asked you to claim the whips from the Orc Slavers.
Bring the Orc-whips to Ondor in the Orc-mines
Ondor the Dwarf is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should bring the whips you collected to Ondor the Dwarf.
